children.subject: If we submit the application before one of the letters is in and then the letter comes in before midnight, will the letter be included? I'd like to submit but one of my letters isn't quite in yet.

history.content:
Because of MANY inquiries..I will make a general announcement regarding several questions that have been asked repeatedly in the last 48 hours:

Q: Will I still be considered for early decision if my advisor has not provided me with their letter of recommendation yet?

A: No. In fairness to all students, ALL materials must be submitted by Nov. 15th This includes LoR. Any incomplete or partial submissions will be deferred until the March 15th deadline.

Q: What is the actual deadline on Nov. 15th? 8:59 PM or 11:59 PM?

A: 11:59 PST. Honestly though, why wait until the last minute?

Q: For the regular round and the early decision round, are there any differences in terms of admission rate or space availability?

A: Nope. Early decision is purely for your own peace of mind.
history.subject: 5th Yr MS Early Decision Deadline
